name: RG Popup
author: RianGraphics

sections.description:
This plugin, RgPopup add a popup to all of your pages or where you want, and you can set from da and to date so you don’t forget to disable it.

A few notes about the sections above:

  • “Contributors” riangraphics
  • “Tags” popup, popup expiry date, popup styles, session popup
  • “Requires at least” 3.5
  • “Tested up to” 5.5
  • “trunk”

Arbitrary section

Nothing to say.
sections.installation:
RgPopup can be installed like any other wordpress plugin.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the RgPopup screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Is this a complicated plugin to use?

Absolutely not, RgPopup is an easy to use plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0

This is the release version use this for now.
